notes: Ceremonial Auras from multiple Ceremonial Robes do not stack.
The aura's debuff lingers for seconds.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Reduces most heroes' total magic resistance to 17.5%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
abilities.description: Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

name: Ceremonial Robe
description: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.
